description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the information disclosure vulnerability in Windows Remote Access Connection Manager (CVE-2024-28900):

1. Apply the latest updates via Windows Update or manually download the necessary KB articles.
2. Ensure the system is updated to one of the specified build versions.

**Details**:
- This vulnerability could result in information disclosure, so timely updates are crucial to mitigate risk.
- For detailed instructions on how to apply updates, refer to the update guide for CVE-2024-28900 available at: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-28900.
- Make sure to restart your system as required after the installation is complete.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running on the specified builds listed for KB updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with installation.
